title: Game crashes, but I can hear the game after re-logging
body:
I just got into a game, and during the champion loading screen the game crashed.

I closed the game, and re-opened it to get back into the game but there was no button that says " reconnect to the game "

I could gear the game, but there wasn't a window of the game running.

The client crashed again, and now there's a window saying :

"We have restored to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version"

It's been 10 mins and it has not moved a bit.

replies.body:
It sounds like League may have had a hard time communicating with your display driver, along with some potential corruptions in your files that could have exacerbated this. I think it would be good to check out the steps in our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to ensure your drivers are good and that windows has been configured to access the right display device.

Let me know if this caused any noticeable change.

If so, then I'd recommend reaching out to our tech team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can assist in checking your system hardware for faults. If you grab a set of system logs using our [HRT App](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to your ticket, it will expedite your service.

Let me know if you have issues with submitting your ticket.
